meanings: (탈것에) take, give (sb) a ride[lift], pick (sb) up

vlive.korean: 탕후루인데 어떻게 태워요 태우는 거야? It's tanghulu. How can you burn it? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 스윗한 태현이의 스윗한거 만들기
vlive.english: It's tanghulu. How can you burn it?

vlive.korean: 또 또 불태워! Fire it up again! 듣기 View video N.Flying : GOOD NIGHT RADIO PART.2
한번 태워줄까? Should I give you a ride? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV6] EP9 막방인 듯 막방 아닌 HIP
vlive.english: Should I give you a ride?

vlive.korean: 야 손을 잡아? 자전거를 태워줘? Hey, hold hands? Give you a ride? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 남자가 직진하는 이유 [나의 이름에게] - EP.04
vlive.english: Hey, hold hands? Give you a ride?

vlive.korean: 맞습니다 - 그런 이... - 박스를 태워요? Right. - So... - Will you burn the box? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.20 논리나잇 #2 (Debate Night #2)
vlive.english: Right. - So... - Will you burn the box?
